price: Guyyaa [Rabbiin] “Hiriyoonni kiyya kan isin dubbataa turtan sun eessa jiru?” jechuun isaanitti lallabu san [yaadadhu].
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
